SPRING
CLEANING

Spring is the perfect time to provide your trees with some extra love and attention. Removing dead or damaged limbs in early Spring will help encourage new, healthy growth. There are also fewer bugs and pests and a lower risk for disease. Flowering trees, in particular, will flourish and thrive after a proper Springtime pruning!

Schedule maintenance ➜
TULSA OWASSO BROKEN ARROW CLAREMORE CATOOSA

Services

We provide complete tree care services to residential and commercial customers

We offer a full range of tree care services to home owners, property managers, and commercial developers

Complete Tree Care

We offer long-term health solutions for your trees, providing peace of mind for the safety, aesthetics, and value of your property.

Tree Removal

Tree removal can be complex and dangerous and should not be attempted alone. Our experienced crews provide safe and efficient tree removal.

Tree Trimming

Most trees require regular trimming. We offer seasonal and on-demand trimming services that help avoid larger problems down the road.

Stump Grinding & Removal

Tree stumps can be unsightly and dangerous. We can grind or remove stumps to restore your landscape.

Emergency Assistance
Emergency Assistance

We understand the urgency when disaster strikes. We provide 24/7 emergency tree services for both commercial and residential customers.

Firewood & Mulch

We offer local delivery and pickup of carefully chosen hardwood firewood and wood chips for mulching. Call our office at 918-691-4047 for available stock.

Why Choose Atkins Tree Care?

As a locally-owned company, Atkins Tree Care understands the importance and value of trees in Green Country.

We provide a full range of high-quality tree care services to protect your investment and their surroundings. We are committed to ensuring your trees are safe, healthy, and beautiful.

Accredited

Our company and employees are fully licensed, bonded, and insured. Ben Atkins is an ISA-certified arborist.

Experienced

Atkins Tree Care has been serving this area for more than a decade

Satisfied Customers

Our customer reviews tell the story of our excellent customer service

Competitive rates

We strive to keep our pricing competitive and fair

Free Estimate

Every tree is unique. By coming to your home or business in person, we can quickly provide a cost-effective, accurate estimate for you. You can also call us to schedule a visit at: 918-691-4047
